memberdef.name: displayMenu0

briefdescription.para: Center the terminal window. The returned length is measured in characters.

simplesect.para: A pair <x,y>. x= terminal horizontal length, y = terminal vertical length.

parameterdescription.para: A pair containing the horizontal and vertical lengths of the terminal.

briefdescription.para: Displays the manage casino menu and reads user choice.

parameterdescription.para: A pair containing the horizontal and vertical lengths of the terminal.
